name: Mound's House Key
description: A key to a house near Darkbourne Bridge.

name: Mound's Hat
description: A large, leather pirate's hat. No idea how someone would sleep in this.

name: Treasure Map
description: A map leading to an island north of Quepland. Mound gave it to you.

name: Mound's Map
description: A map that shows the location of a secret island to the west. You'll have to find someone to sail you there.

name: Bloody Knife
description: A knife covered in blood. It was found in First Mate Fremp's bed.

name: A lot of Camels
description: A huge number of dromedaries owned by Carl, the camel salesman at Desert's Mouth.

name: Queple's Giant Sword
description: A massive sword. You definitely can't use it the way it is now. Maybe there's a way to change that...

name: Queple's Sword(Inactive)
description: A strange sword. It doesn't seem to work quite right. Maybe you should return it...

name: Poison
description: A deadly liquid, you definitely should not drink it...

name: Potaki's Tear
description: A shiny necklace roped around a glistening tear-shaped stone. It feels warm to the touch.
